00019 bool PairCalculator2::EvaluateFrame(Topology *top) {
00020 
00021     // Rigidify if (a) not rigid yet (b) rigidification at all possible
00022     if (!top->isRigid()) {
00023         bool isRigid = top->Rigidify();
00024         if (!isRigid) { return 0; }
00025     }
00026     else { cout << endl << "... ... System is already rigidified."; }
00027     cout << endl;
00028 
00029     QMNBList &nblist = top->NBList();
00030 
00031     QMNBList::iterator pit;
00032     for (pit = nblist.begin(); pit != nblist.end(); pit++) {
00033 
00034         EvaluatePair(top, *pit);
00035 
00036         if ( (*pit)->getId() == -1 ) {
00037             
00038             string pairId = boost::lexical_cast<string>((*pit)->getId());
00039             string pdbname = "Pair" + pairId + ".pdb";
00040             (*pit)->WritePDB(pdbname);
00041         }
00042 
00043     }
00044     
00045     return 1;
00046 }
